goals__remit: Founded in 1961, Eurogypsum is a European federation of national associations of gypsum products manufacturers, based in Brussels and registered in Belgium as an AISBL (International Non-Profit Association). Its role is to promote the interests of the European Gypsum Industry and ensure that there is awareness at a European level of the contribution the Gypsum Industry makes to society in general and to the built environment in particular.
